actions.committee: Senate Committee on Agriculture and Forestry
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Agriculture and Forestry.

official_title: A bill to prohibit the Federal Government from restricting export sales of agricultural commodities.

summary.text: Prohibits, under the Agricultural Act of 1970, the Federal Government from restricting the export sales of agricultural commodities through the negotiation of voluntary restraints on the sale of such commodities to a foreign government or agent thereof. States that this Act does not affect the authority of the President in prohibiting or curtailing such exports.

titles.title: A bill to prohibit the Federal Government from restricting export sales of agricultural commodities.
